      • createBody

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body createBody(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                                                             float centerX,
                                                             float centerY,
                                                             float width,
                                                             float height,
                                                             com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.BodyDef.BodyType bodyType,
                                                             java.lang.Object userData)
        Creates a basic static body.
        Parameters:
        world - An instance of the Box2D world.
        centerX - The x location of the center of the body (world units)
        centerY - The y location of the center of the body (world units)
        width - The width of the body (world units)
        height - The height of the body (world units)
        bodyType - The bodytype of the body.
        userData - The user data of the body's fixture.
